fields.value: National Demographic Survey [Philippines], 1973: Supplemented with Treiman Prestige Scores

datasetContactAffiliation.value: University of California, Los Angeles. Social Science Data Archive.

dsDescriptionValue.value: This study was originally conducted through the Population Institute at the University of the Philippines, Bureau of the Census and Statistics as a part of the National Demographic Survey in 1973. Later, Donald Treiman from the Sociology department at UCLA obtained the data and coded the responses with prestige scores to examine the respondents' occupations . The final results of the study were one of the many data sets used to construct an International Socio-Economic Index of occupational status (ISEI), comparing social and economic mobility patterns in various nations.

topicClassValue.value: Occupational, Geographic, and Social Stratification and Mobility

fields.value: Subject: STANDARD DEPOSIT TERMS 1.0  Type: DATAPASS:TERMS:STANDARD:1.0  Notes: The UCLA Social Science Data Archive (“the Archive”) gives permission and any required licenses to Data-PASS to make the Content available for archiving, preservation and access (with permission of the Archive), within the Data Preservation Alliance for the Social Sciences ("Data-PASS") in accordance with the Data-PASS terms (the "Terms") of use (available from: http://www.icpsr.org/Data-PASS). Including permission to: (a) redisseminate copies of the Data Collection in a variety of distribution formats only according to the standard terms of use of the Archive; (b) promote and advertise the Data Collection in any publicity (in any form) for Data-PASS and the Archive; (c) describe, catalog, validate and document the Content; (d) store, translate, copy or re-format the Data Collection in any way to ensure its future preservation and accessibility, improve usability and/or protect respondent confidentiality; (e) incorporate metadata (cataloging information) or documentation regarding this study into public access catalogues. The Archive represents and warrants that the Content conforms to all Terms and that the Archive is lawfully entitled and has full authority to license Data-Pass to use the Materials in the ways described in the Terms.;
